Player History
Injured on 4/1/1965 with a Bruised Hand, out for 4 days...
Injured on 4/23/1965 with a Fractured Hand, out for 3-4 weeks...
Released by Chicago (N) on 11/4/1965...
Drafted in 2nd round, 33rd overall pick, by St. Louis in 1968...
Injured on 5/24/1968 with a Broken Foot, out for 8 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/20/1972, off Steve Mingori (NYM)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/5/1972, off Gaylord Perry (SF)...
Signed as a free agent by Cincinnati on 2/20/1978 to a 3-year deal worth $1,250,000 per year...
Won Gold Glove Award at Leftfield in 1980...
